string-array.name: sample_contents
string-array.item: 3 matches with 0 kills... Your sucker level is awesome! Why don\'t you try killing someone, someday?
Good players play FPP, that\'s why you play tpp. Have a look at this tutorial
Nah, just kidding. You are so bad. Probably your mouse sensitivity is involved. We\'ve prepared this tutorial so maybe you improve your playstyle
I mean, There\'s nothing wrong about being bad. But you are. This tutorial won\'t fix it, but have a look at it anyway
We just noticed that you won a match or two. That was for sure hiding and playing like a rat. Check out this tutorial to improve your playstyle
You are an authentic top 10 rat. Try to get a high rating and brag with your friends, while you don\'t even kill a cold. Have a look at this tutorial, noob
With these numbers, one thing is sure: You h4x. We recommend you these gaming gadgets to start playing for real and stop using this wallhack you know you have

Just kidding. You suck big time. Any average player with .45 P1911 can beat you with full AKM + SKS. We send you this tutorial to learn to spray and control vertical recoil (though we known it\'s useless)

So much speed, so much momentum. The doc is simply The doc. Are you gonna peek? Go hide behind a tree and come back when there is a top 10 situation where The doc can be involved, everyone will have Kar98k for dinner except the 2x Champion. Cumcumcumcum
Chuck Norris was about to start playing PUBG. Then he found ByRubi9\'s videos and saw him playing. He decided to give up and go somewhere else
